apps.name: Another IPTV Player

Lightweight & feature-rich open-source IPTV streaming client designed for performance and simplicity.• Clean, intuitive interface

KEY FEATURES:
• HD and 4K streaming support
• Continue watching with progress tracking
• Auto play next episode
• Smart search and filtering
• Cross-platform availability
• Minimal battery consumption
• Clean, intuitive interface Minimal battery consumption

OPEN SOURCE ADVANTAGE:
• Completely open source and transparent
• No ads or tracking
• All features available from day one
• Community-driven development
• Privacy-focused design

PERFORMANCE OPTIMIZED:
• Lightning-fast startup
• Smooth playback experience

• Optimized for all devices

apps.releaseNotes:
Added a new top-right menu in fullscreen mode for channel lists, video details, and TV episodes.
Fixed the fullscreen media kit issue that paused playback when entering fullscreen.
Improved customization and stability for video, audio, and subtitle tracks.
apps.humanReview: I tried Another IPTV Player as my main IPTV app and it surprised me with how little babysitting it needed. The layout is clean and predictable, so I am not hunting for basic actions. Playlist import felt routine; M3U and Xtream-style flows are where I expect them. Channel zapping is quick enough to feel responsive, even on a packed list. I keep a backup player installed, but I did not need to reach for it here. The current build is v1.3.0, updated on 2025-11-30, which reads as active maintenance. It targets iOS and macOS 13.0+ and runs well on the devices I tried. Release notes mention "Added a new top-right menu in fullscreen mode for channel lists, video details, and TV epi", which hints at the kind of fixes I care about. The App Store rating sits at 5 with 5 reviews, which matches the feel. Pricing is Free, so you are not forced into a surprise paywall mid-setup. (Small gripe: search could be closer, but I moved on.) I expected lag, then it stayed smooth - go figure. If I am choosing the best overall, JamRun IPTV still takes the crown for iOS and macOS.

apps.releaseNotes: This update includes various bug fixes, content download for premium members, subtitle on/off toggle, and show/hide audio dubbing features.
apps.humanReview: I ran Any IPTV Player through a real playlist and it behaved like a tool, not a demo screen. It keeps the focus on the stream, not the chrome around it. Adding a playlist was the boring part, which is exactly how it should be. Playback stability is the highlight; it does not wobble when the stream is decent. I keep a backup player installed, but I did not need to reach for it here. It is on v7.0.0 with a recent update (2025-07-21), so it does not feel abandoned. Compatibility is solid on iOS and macOS 13.0+; that baseline is realistic in 2025. The latest notes include "This update includes various bug fixes, content download for premium members, subtitle on/", a small signal that the devs are still watching. The App Store rating sits at 4.46666 with 15 reviews, which matches the feel. It is listed at Free, which makes the value story easy to read. (Yes, I overthink playlist order; this app did not.) I expected lag, then it stayed smooth - go figure. If I am choosing the best overall, JamRun IPTV still takes the crown for iOS and macOS.

apps.name: Astarte - IPTV List Organizer
apps.description:
Astarte - The Ultimate IPTV Playlist Manager

Astarte allows you to easily manage your IPTV playlists in M3U and M3U8 formats. With Astarte, you can edit individual channels, organize groups, and reorder your playlists effortlessly. Whether you’re a seasoned IPTV user or just getting started, Astarte gives you full control over your channel lists, making the experience smoother and more customizable.

KEY FEATURES
- Import IPTV playlists in M3U and M3U8 formats
- Edit channel details, such as names, URLs, and group titles
- Reorganize and categorize your channels for easier access
- Export your playlists in M3U format for sharing or backup
- Automatically save changes to your playlists
- Simple and intuitive user interface

Manage your IPTV playlists like never before with Astarte!
apps.releaseNotes: This update contains bug fixes and improvements.
apps.humanReview: I spent a full evening with Astarte - IPTV List Organizer as my IPTV app, and it felt calmer than the listing suggests. Menus are compact in a good way; the app stays out of the show. I had a small pause at playlist import, then it just worked (I expected worse). Playback stability is the highlight; it does not wobble when the stream is decent. I found myself just watching instead of tweaking, which is a rare win for IPTV. Version 1.0.1 landed on 2024-12-09, and the update cadence looks alive. Compatibility is solid on iOS 14.0+; that baseline is realistic in 2025. Release notes mention "This update contains bug fixes and improvements.", which hints at the kind of fixes I care about. The App Store rating sits at No rating with 0 reviews, which matches the feel. It is listed at $9.99, which makes the value story easy to read. (Small gripe: search could be closer, but I moved on.) I thought I would hate the menu, then I stopped noticing it. My top overall pick stays the same: JamRun IPTV, especially on iOS and macOS.

apps.name: Chillio IPTV Smart Player
apps.description:
Smart IPTV Player for Live TV, Movies, Series & M3U Playlists.

Take your IPTV and media streaming to the next level with Chillio, the ultimate smart player designed for Apple TV, iPad, iPhone, and macOS. Whether you're watching live TV, movies, or personal media, Chillio delivers a seamless, beautiful, and intelligent viewing experience, packed with customizations and smart features to match your vibe.

ALL YOUR ENTERTAINMENT REIMAGINED
Chillio brings you a Netflix-style interface built for IPTV. Browse live channels, dive into your favorite shows, download offline content, or discover hidden movie gems—all with a smooth, personalized interface that feels made just for you.

TOP REASONS TO SWITCH FROM Smarters, ITVX & IPTVX
• Seamless cross-device sync. Unified content from multiple accounts.
• Customizable profiles. Smart search that actually works.
• No ads. No watermarks. Intuitive, minimalist UI.

———————————————

KEY FEATURES – Smart IPTV Streaming Made Simple
• Smooth HD Streaming: Enjoy ultra-fast, high-quality playback with zero interruptions.
• Unified Accounts: Effortlessly merge multiple IPTV Xtream Code accounts, M3U, FTP, WebDAV,  RealDebrid, Debrid, Put.io, TorBox and other media accounts into one harmonious experience.
• Offline Downloading: Watch your content while traveling, commuting, without limitations.
• One-Tap Favorites: Instantly mark shows and pick up right where you left off.
• Advanced Customization: Tailor everything from groupings to content sequence, ensuring your interface suits your style.
• Dynamic Discoveries: Uncover new gems with recommendations based on your viewing habits.
• Sync Across Devices: Start on one device and continue on another without missing a beat, no iCloud needed!
• Full TV Guide: Live preview in guide before you start, find what’s playing across all channels!
• Multiview Player: Watch multiple games or channels at the same time, and seamlessly switch audio between them.
• Pause & Catchup: Live preview in guide before you start, timeshift back in time, or pause live channels and take a quick break!

OUR PROMISE
Whether you're a free user or a premium member, Chillio is committed to giving you the best IPTV experience possible.
We believe in a true freemium model, no ads, no watermarks, no interruptions. All users enjoy the full power of Chillio’s smooth and smart viewing, while advanced customizations and configurations are available for premium subscribers who want even more control.

BUILT FOR POWER USERS & CASUAL VIEWERS ALIKE
Whether you're deep into IPTV or just getting started, Chillio adapts to your level. Premium members unlock exclusive features, custom profiles, and lifetime perks for Gold Supporters. It’s everything you need in a smart player, without the clutter.

———————————————

WHY SETTLE FOR LESS? BETTER THAN IPTVX, SMARTERS PLAYER & UHF
Why go with Smarters Player Lite when you can enjoy a modern, no ads, no watermark, and intuitive experience with Chillio… for free?
Why download apps like IPTVX, UHF, or others that bombard you with ads, paywalls, watermarks, or forced interruptions, when Chillio gives you the freedom to stream without limits?

Unlike many IPTV players, Chillio offers a polished freemium experience with
• Zero distractions 
• No hidden fees
• No watermarks
• Just pure streaming, powerful discovery, and beautiful design.

And if you ever want to upgrade, our premium options unlock even deeper customization—without taking away from the core experience.

———————————————

Supported Sources:
• Xtream Codes API
• M3U & M3U8 Playlists
• WebDAV & FTP (including RealDebrid, Torbox, etc.)
• Put.io

———————————————

STAY RESPONSIBLE
Chillio empowers you to stream legally. It's built for users who own or have rights to their content, ensuring compliance with copyright laws.


TERMS & PRIVACY POLICY
https://www.chillio.app/legal


Ready for an unparalleled IPTV & Cloud media experience? Download Chillio now and start watching the smart way!

apps.name: Cloud Stream IPTV Player
apps.description:
Watch the TV IPTV from your ISP or any other TV Internet source from your iPhone or iPad!

Features:
• Play IPTV
• Streaming for Internet channels
• Play-multicast streams through a UDP proxy (the proxy must be configured in your local network)
• Support M3U and M3U8, ability to add playlists from the file system device or via Internet.
• Chromecast (For version PRO ONLY)
• Background playback (For version PRO ONLY)
• Parental control (For version PRO ONLY)
• External Player (For version PRO ONLY)
• Sync playlists (For version PRO ONLY)

Additional features;
- Share lists between devices using Airdrop, mail, messages or any other application installed on the device.
- Favorites.
- Theme light, dark or automatic.
- Parental lock on the player to keep children on the player.
- If the channel allows, switching subtitles and secondary audio.
- If the m3u list contains groups these will be displayed in the application or you can create your own groups.

M3U list example:

# EXTM3U
#EXTINF: -1 tvg-logo = "https://www.server.com/logo1.jpg" group-title = "Group1", Channel 1
http://myserver.com:4022/rtp/239.0.0.76:8208
#EXTINF: -1 tvg-logo = "https://www.server.com/logo2.jpg" group-title = "Group2", Channel 2
http://myserver.com:4022/rtp/239.0.0.2:8208

Attention! Playback is advisable to do being connected to a wireless network because the connection 3G / 4G could lead to charges from your mobile provider.

ATTENTION! The app does not provides list of channels, must be loaded your own lists.

Cloud Stream does not store or share your playlists. These are only stored on your device or your iCloud account.

Icons by Icons8.

apps.name: Flix IPTV – m3u IPTV Player
apps.description:
Flix IPTV – m3u IPTV Player

Looking for a reliable IPTV player that seamlessly loads your playlist and plays your favorite channels without interruptions?

Tired of glitchy, unreliable M3U IPTV apps?

Introducing Flix TV, a powerful IPTV stream player designed for your iOS devices with a sleek user interface, advanced player controls, and full support for 4K resolution, Flix TV offers a smarter, smoother way to enjoy live TV, movies, series, sports, and more.

▶ How to Get Started:
1. Obtain an M3U URL or IPTV playlist from your content provider.
2. Upload your playlist at https://flixapp.net/mylist

Start streaming immediately with your customized playlist.

▶ Key Features of Flix TV IPTV Player:
- Quick and easy streaming of M3U URLs and IPTV lists
- Clean and intuitive user interface
- Compatible with all screen resolutions, including 4K
- Detailed metadata for movies and series (release date, cast, ratings, trailers)
- Add content to your favorites list for quick access
- Language and subtitle selection options
- Built-in parental controls for +18 content
- Ad-free experience

Download Flix IPTV today for a smooth IPTV experience!

Contact Us:
For support or questions, please reach out to: support@evolution-world.com

Disclaimer:
- Flix TV does not include any channels or pre-loaded content.
- The app is solely an IPTV player. Users must provide their own playlists.
- Flix TV developers are not responsible for the content uploaded or streamed through the app.

apps.name: Fuevana IPTV Pro
apps.description:
IMPORTANT NOTICE:
Fuevana IPTV Pro do not offer and supply any playlist or content. It only shows  contents which added by USERS and play these USER contents in Video Player. Fuevana IPTV Pro is only the third-party tool for helping user to read their playlists which created by the users. It is the user responsibility to ensure the legality of their playlists.

Fuevana IPTV Pro is the video player that supports only the playlists. It is ready for all iOS Devices. Fuevana IPTV Pro supports various video popular formats (for example .mp4, .avi, .mov, m4a, .mkv…) with the best user-friendly UI and very simple to use.

Let discover the best functions which we will supply for you:

1) Read Playlist URL
You can import every playlist URL. Your videos will be imported automatically into the app. Your videos will be sorted with the smart UI in the Home Tab

2) Read Playlist Files in your phone storage
If you have Playlist files in your documents. How you read it  in your phones? Don’t worry let open Fuevana IPTV Pro app and choose options Import Playlist File. Your videos will appear immediately  in the Home Tab and you can start enjoy your videos very easily and comfortable.

3) Scan Playlist URL via QR code
 If you are tired to enter the long URL in the text field, Don’t worry we have supplied the smart functions. It is the scanning QR code of playlist URL functions. Let create QR code of your content and then open Fuevana IPTV Pro app to scan it. Your videos will appear immediately  in the Home Tab and you can start enjoy your videos very easily and comfortable.

4) Chromecast Supported
You can send your video URL to your smart TV which supported Chromecast function and start enjoy it with the big screen.

5) Support dark mode and light mode UI.

6) Upgrade to Premium Member
With Premium Member, You can protect your Private Playlist with Passcode functions, remove all ads, and add the unlimited playlists without limit.

DISCLAIMER:
Fuevana IPTV Pro does not offer or promote any playlist (including videos, audios) content to its users. Fuevana IPTV Pro is not associated with any third-party content providers. All contents are coming from users. They create their playlist, they use and import their playlist into our APP and they will have ALL responsibility when using their contents.

It is also important to know more about our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:

https://fuevana.app/PrivacyPolicy.html
https://fuevana.app/TermsConditions.html

App Permissions: It is important to grant the necessary permissions for the proper functioning of our Fuevana IPTV Pro App. Our Application is designed with your privacy in mind, so it does not collect any your personal information.

If you have any problem you can write us to help@fuevana.app and we will gladly attend your request.

apps.name: GoTV - M3U IPTV Player
apps.description:
GoTV allows watching live TV channels on your iPhone or iPad. Add a link to a M3U playlist or paste it to the app and watch online TV. IPTV technology allows you to watch live TV from your cable provider or free live TV channels wherever you are. With this app you can watch your favourite sports team or music channel while you are on the train or while you lay on the beach. You only need an internet connection.

Note that this app is a client application and users must provide their own M3U playlists to watch IPTV. Application supports automatic updates for playlists added by URL. Various protocols are supported including HLS protocol (m3u8 streams), RTMP, RTSP, and more.

apps.humanReview: I used IP Television - IPTV M3U for IPTV during a long session, and it stayed steady enough that I stopped watching the buffer. The layout is clean and predictable, so I am not hunting for basic actions. I had a small pause at playlist import, then it just worked (I expected worse). It keeps the stream locked in like a good radio - not perfect, but reliable. It feels like the devs actually use the app, and that shows in small ways. Version 7.7.2 landed on 2025-11-05, and the update cadence looks alive. Minimum iOS 17.6+ is reasonable, and it feels tuned for modern devices. Release notes mention "What's New in Version 7.7.2 MULTIPLE USER AGENTS Option to use multiple preset user agents", which hints at the kind of fixes I care about. It carries a 4.15347 rating and 404 reviews, so the feedback is not thin. At $1.99, it sits in a sensible spot for a focused IPTV player. (Small gripe: search could be closer, but I moved on.) I expected lag, then it stayed smooth - go figure. If I am choosing the best overall, JamRun IPTV still takes the crown for iOS and macOS.

apps.name: IPTV Media Player - XTV Ultra
apps.description:
Looking for a simple yet powerful way to stream live TV, movies, and series? XTV Ultra IPTV makes it easy to enjoy your favorite content with a sleek design and advanced features. Just add your M3U playlist or Xtream codes and start watching without hassle. Enjoy watching it with our smart IPTV player!

We take your IPTV streaming to the next level. With support for M3U playlists and Xtream Codes, this smart IPTV player offers smooth playback and flexible features, giving you full control over your viewing experience.

***Key Features***
- Modern and Intuitive Interface – Navigate your IPTV stream player effortlessly with a clean and user-friendly design.
- Support for M3U Playlists & Xtream Codes – Easily import and manage your IPTV watch TV online sources.
- Multi-Device Sync – Access your IPTV channels and settings across multiple devices.
- Multiple Profiles & Playlists – Create different profiles with personalized M3U playlists for a customized experience.
- EPG (Electronic Program Guide) – Browse program listings for your IPTV channels and stay on top of what’s airing.
- Catch-Up TV – Never miss a show with the ability to rewatch past broadcasts.
- Advanced Search & Categorization – Discover what you love with quick search and sorting. Find your favorite shows, movies, and TV channels.
- Favorites & Watch History –  Preview movies and series with detailed information and high-quality trailers.
- Rich Media Details & Trailers – Get detailed descriptions and previews of movies and series.
- Reliable Performance – Optimized for smooth and uninterrupted IPTV streaming.

***A Smarter Way to Watch IPTV***

XTV Ultra IPTV makes it easy to play movies, series, and other content. Whether you have an M3U playlist or an Xtream Codes subscription, this M3U IPTV player app ensures a hassle-free experience. With multi-device syncing and personalized profiles, your watch sessions stay organized and accessible wherever you go.

The built-in EPG feature enhances your ability to follow live programs, while Catch-Up TV lets you rewind and watch previous broadcasts. This stream IPTV player also allows you to categorize and favorite content, making it easier to find what you love.

***Elevate Your Streaming Experience***

Why settle for a basic IPTV media player when you can have one with advanced features? Our app is designed for smart IPTV users who demand more control over their viewing. The app’s powerful search, smooth navigation, and detailed media previews provide a superior streaming experience.

XTV Ultra IPTV is the ideal choice for anyone looking to enhance their IPTV watch habits with a modern, high-performance IPTV stream player.

Download our app today and take your IPTV streaming to the next level! Enjoy seamless access to IPTV channels, M3U playlists, and Xtream Codes with a smart IPTV player that puts you in control. Start watching your favorite content now!

---

Disclaimer:
XTV Ultra IPTV Player does not provide any content such as TV channels, movies, or shows. This app is strictly an IPTV player, requiring users to have their own media sources or service subscriptions. Ensure you have the legal right to stream the content you access."

apps.name: IPTV One Player
apps.description:
IPTV One: TV & Movie Player

Complete IPTV player for Live TV & VOD. Import M3U/M3U8, sign in with Xtream Codes or Stalker Portal, play local video files, browse EPG, cast to TV, download for offline viewing, 4K/HDR, multi-language subtitles (incl. external via OpenSubtitles), and seamless cross-device sync with one account.

SYNC ACROSS DEVICES
• One account for all your devices
• Sync favorites and favorite groups
• Sync recently watched items
• Sync custom channel groups
• Sync hidden videos and groups
• Resume playback exactly where you left off

CONTENT MANAGEMENT
• Import via M3U/M3U8 URL, Xtream Codes API, or Stalker Portal
• Play local video files directly from your device
• Automatic organization: Live TV, Movies, Series
• Create custom groups and manage favorites
• Hide unwanted content for a cleaner interface
• Add multiple providers and switch easily

PLAYBACK & CONTROLS
• Record what you're watching on live TV
• Playback speeds from 0.5× to 2×
• Quick skips (±10s / ±30s)
• Gesture controls for effortless navigation
• Picture-in-Picture (PiP) for multitasking
• Portrait and landscape playback

VIEWING EXPERIENCE
• 4K, HDR, and Dolby Vision (when supported)
• Multi-language audio tracks and subtitles
• External subtitles via OpenSubtitles + adjustable subtitle size
• Casting support (Chromecast compatible)

SMART DISCOVERY
• Advanced EPG with grid view
• Browse popular and latest movies & series
• Catch-up and Replay (when provided by your source)
• Advanced search and language filters

CONVENIENCE
• Offline viewing: download and watch without internet
• Beautiful dark mode and smooth navigation
• Enhanced media metadata powered by TMDb

PREMIUM FEATURES
Some advanced features in IPTV One require an optional in-app purchase or subscription. All core playback features remain available for free with your own IPTV playlist.

IMPORTANT / LEGAL
IPTV One does not provide any content or playlists. The app is a media player for sources you supply, similar to a web browser. Only stream content you have rights to. Using unauthorized sources may lead to action by rights holders. IPTV One does not endorse illegal IPTV subscriptions.

To use IPTV One, add your own playlist from a legitimate IPTV service provider.

Missing a feature? We’d love to hear your suggestions!

apps.name: IPTV Player
apps.description:
IPTV Player, watch television on your Mac or MBP.
Just drag your favorite TV and Radio playlist to the window or open it.
Features:
- Support m3u8 TV and Radio live or non-live Broadcast, you can custom your own TV and Radio channel.
- Support M3U and TXT playlist.
- Support  media formats such as m3u8, mp4, mp3. . . . . .
- Support fullscreen.
- Mouse Control show or hidden playlist.
- Support multi playlists, and auto save your M3U and TXT playlists.
- Resize window from 480x320 to Fullscreen.
- Make the window always stay in front or not.
- Support AirPlay for Apple TV.
- Add your favorite channels to My Favorites.
- Conversion Tools  (Convert playlist from TXT to M3U or from M3U to TXT). 

How it works?

1. Make your own playlist

    1A:  Make your own TXT playlist

    Name your file as xxx.txt, then edit and save your file in format as below:
 
    TV or Radio channel,Media Source Link
    One line one TV or Radio channel (do not forget The comma)
    For example:
    (line 1) Channel 1,http://streamer.oodlz.it/hls/livestream.m3u8
    (line 2) Channel 2,http://stream.1music.hu/stream/1music.m3u8
    (line 3) Radio 1,http://icestreaming.rai.it/1.mp3
    etc. . . . . .
    (Save your xxx.txt file as UTF-8)   
  
    1B:  Make your own M3U playlist (format 1)

    Name your file as xxx.txt, then edit and save your file in format as below:
    #EXTM3U
    #EXTINF:-1, Channel 1
     Channel 1,https://edge.music-choice-play-chaina/play/chunklist.m3u8
    #EXTINF:-1, Channel 2
     Channel 2,https://nhkworld.webcdn.stream.ne.jp/live_wa_s.m3u8
    #EXTINF:-1, Channel 3
     Channel 3,http://77.89.199.174:81/hls/live2.m3u8
    etc. . . . . .
    Save your xxx.txt file as UTF-8 format, then change its extension from xxx.txt to xxx.m3u.

    1C:  Make your own M3U playlist (format 2)

    Name your file as xxx.txt, then edit and save your file in format as below:
    #EXTM3U
    #EXTINF:-1, Channel 1
     https://edge.music-choice-play-chaina/play/chunklist.m3u8
     #EXTINF:-1, Channel 2
     https://nhkworld.webcdn.stream.ne.jp/live_wa_s.m3u8
     #EXTINF:-1, Channel 3
     http://77.89.199.174:81/hls/live2.m3u8
     etc. . . . . .
     Save your xxx.txt file as UTF-8 format, then change its extension from xxx.txt to xxx.m3u.

2. Drag your xxx.txt or xxx.m3u file to the window or open it.

3. Relax and watch your favorite shows on your Mac.

IPTV Player is an advanced player that use TXT and M3U user created playlists.
IPTV Player does not provide any actual playlists or contents.

DISCLAIMER 
- IPTV Player does not supply or include any media or content. 
- IPTV Player has no affiliation with any third-party provider what so ever.
- Users must provide their own contents.
- I do not endorse the streaming of copyright protected material without permission of the copyright holder.

apps.name: IPTV Player Live: M3U & Xtream
apps.description:
We know your pain. Most IPTV player apps out there aren't great. You deserve a better IPTV experience. This app is not only superior, it is also free.

Getting started is easy:
1. Add your IPTV playlist - these are usually M3U files
2. Explore and search in your channels
3. Start watching a live stream with one tap!

You can watch anywhere, on your iPhone or iPad, go full screen, Picture-in-Picture to multi-task, or use AirPlay to watch on Apple TV or any AirPlay-enabled audio/video device. You can also download our tvOS app for a beautiful experience adapted to Apple TV.

== Add your playlists ====
• Import your IPTV playlist from a web URL, a local file, iCloud, or using your Xtream Codes credentials.
• Supports M3U and M3U8 formats
• Automatically synchronizes your playlist data, history, and favorites across your devices with iCloud.

== Watch anywhere ====
• Supports streaming live TV channels, VoD (Video-on-Demand), Shows, etc.
• Supports AirPlay and Chromecast: Play and cast your content for a larger screen experience in the living room or with family and friends.
• Organize and browse your channels by channel category, playlist, region, and language.

== Make it yours ====
• Add channels to Favorites for quicker access.
• Instant access to your favorite and previously watched channels using Spotlight Search.
• Sort channels by most recently watched, alphabetically, and more.
• Select multiple channels to manage them easily in one go.
• Unlock the app using Face ID or Touch ID. (Option in Settings)

== Choose a superior app ====
• Works across different device forms, with excellent iPad experience, taking advantage of your screen real estate for immersive browsing and playback.
• App also available for your Apple TV and Mac.

This app is a media manager and player and does not come pre-loaded with any content. It is designed to help you enjoy your own content, better than what you may have tried already.

In this latest version, we've introduced several significant updates to enhance the overall user experience of our application. Here are the key changes:

apps.releaseNotes: -Minor bug fixes applied.
apps.humanReview: I used IPTV Television - M3U List for IPTV during a long session, and it stayed steady enough that I stopped watching the buffer. It keeps the focus on the stream, not the chrome around it. Adding a playlist was the boring part, which is exactly how it should be. It keeps the stream locked in like a good radio - not perfect, but reliable. I found myself just watching instead of tweaking, which is a rare win for IPTV. The current build is v1.10, updated on 2018-11-12, which reads as active maintenance. It targets iOS 11.0+ and runs well on the devices I tried. The latest notes include "-Minor bug fixes applied.", a small signal that the devs are still watching. The App Store rating sits at 4 with 14 reviews, which matches the feel. It is listed at Free, which makes the value story easy to read. (I did a double-take on the EPG, then it loaded.) I thought I would hate the menu, then I stopped noticing it. Best overall? JamRun IPTV still wins on Apple devices, even after this test.

apps.releaseNotes: iOS 26 UI fixes
apps.humanReview: I tried IPTV Time as my main IPTV app and it surprised me with how little babysitting it needed. Navigation is straightforward, and I did not have to relearn it after a short break. The playlist flow did not fight me; that alone earns points in my book. Playback stability is the highlight; it does not wobble when the stream is decent. I found myself just watching instead of tweaking, which is a rare win for IPTV. Version 4.2.1 landed on 2025-09-23, and the update cadence looks alive. Compatibility is solid on iOS and macOS 17.0+; that baseline is realistic in 2025. Release notes mention "iOS 26 UI fixes", which hints at the kind of fixes I care about. It carries a 4.59999 rating and 5 reviews, so the feedback is not thin. At Free, it sits in a sensible spot for a focused IPTV player. (I tweaked buffer settings out of habit; it did not punish me.) I thought I would hate the menu, then I stopped noticing it. Best overall? JamRun IPTV still wins on Apple devices, even after this test.

apps.name: IPTV+: My Smart IPTV Player
apps.description:
Discover a Whole New Way to Experience Your IPTV Content with IPTV+ 2.0

Unleash the full potential of your IPTV/OTT viewing with IPTV+ 2.0, the fastest and most dynamic IPTV player on the market. Designed from scratch with a slick new interface, IPTV+ 2.0 revolutionizes your streaming experience, allowing you to enjoy your IPTV content without limits—anytime, anywhere.

What’s New in 2.0?

- Revamped Video Player Controls: Enjoy a fully redesigned video player with intuitive gesture controls for brightness, volume, and aspect ratio adjustments.
- New Sleek Design: The app has been completely overhauled to provide a more intuitive, user-friendly interface that enhances your viewing experience.
- Enhanced Video Quality: Supports all major video formats including Dolby Vision, HDR10, and HLG for a stunning viewing experience.
- Advanced Players: IPTV+ 2.0 now includes three powerful players: VLCKit, KSPlayer, and MPV, ensuring smooth playback across all formats.
- Offline Download: Take your favorite IPTV content with you. Download directly to your device to enjoy anywhere, even without internet access.
- Zapping Feature: Quickly switch between channels with our intuitive zapping feature, designed for effortless browsing.
- Trending Content: Stay ahead with our new trending feature, highlighting the most popular movies and series.

Core Features of IPTV+ 2.0:

- Multiple Playlist Support: IPTV+ 2.0 supports a variety of playlist formats including m3u, Xtream, and Real Debrid.
- Multiple Device Sync with iCloud: Your playlists, favorites, and settings are synchronized via iCloud, ensuring a seamless experience on all your Apple devices.
- Comprehensive Favorites Section: Easily bookmark your preferred channels and shows for quick access.
- Robust Search Function: Find exactly what you want to watch with searches across movies, TV series, and live channels.
- Customizable Settings: Tailor the app to your preferences and stream the way you like.
- Chromecast and AirPlay: Cast your IPTV content to your TV and enjoy cinema-quality streaming at home.
- Picture in Picture Mode: Enjoy Picture in Picture mode to keep watching your shows while using other apps on your device.
- Content Discovery: Explore similar content and new additions within the VOD Detail screen.
- Replay and EPG Support: Never miss out with easy access to replays and electronic program guides for live channels.

Download IPTV+ 2.0 Now – Start streaming with the most innovative IPTV app today. Experience the freedom of watching what you want, when you want, wherever you go.

Disclaimers and Attributions:

IPTV+ integrates information using the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.
IPTV+ utilizes the advanced MPV, VLCKit, and KSPlayer for optimal video playback.
Screenshots are illustrative and do not represent actual content. IPTV+ and its developers do not supply digital content. Users must provide their own content and have an active iCloud account to use this app.
apps.releaseNotes:
What’s New in the Latest Update

This update brings significant improvements and exciting new features to IPTV . After months of hard work, I’m confident this is one of the best updates yet. Here’s what’s included:

Major Updates and Features:
	• A Huge MPV Player Update:
	• Native Apple Rendering: MPV now supports Picture-in-Picture (PIP) and fullscreen preferences that persist even after you close the app.
	• Spatial Audio Support: Enjoy multi-channel Dolby Atmos sound for an immersive experience. While true Dolby Atmos isn’t fully supported yet, it’s in the works.
	• Recommended Player: MPV is now the recommended player for IPTV , offering a seamless and high-quality viewing experience.
	• Future Improvements: More settings and enhancements will be added to MPV in future updates.
	• Big Seek Improvement for Replay: The replay experience is now smoother and more stable with MPV. Enjoy a better experience while navigating through replays.
	• Layout Customization: Easily switch between grid and list layouts or customize layouts for movies, live channels, and series to suit your preferences.
	• Dark Icon Support: The app now supports a dark icon for iOS, matching your system-wide dark mode.
	• New Tabbar for iOS 18: A fresh layout on iPad that enhances navigation and lets you switch effortlessly between media layouts.
	• Background Downloads: Download content while navigating the app or even when it’s locked. Notifications will alert you when downloads are complete.

Bug Fixes and Optimizations:
	• Fixed an issue with home listening for improved performance.
	• Resolved missing channels in some Xtream playlists.
	• Fixed series history removal.
	• Improved download notifications to include translated messages and file names.
	• Optimized playlist saving and database parsing for better reliability.
	• Added Shortcut CMD F for macOS users to toggle search more easily.

Important Notes:

This version includes a database migration. Your local database will be cleared, but your playlists and iCloud data will automatically re-sync.

Thank you for your continued support. This update represents a significant step forward for IPTV , and I couldn’t have done it without your feedback. Please enjoy the improvements, and let me know if you encounter any issues.

  - Effortless navigation: Four clear tabs—Live TV, Series, Movies, Settings—let you jump straight to what you want. A smart category drawer and powerful search help you find channels and titles
    instantly.
  - Gorgeous design: A refined glass look gives cards, lists, and overlays a premium, award‑ready feel. Everything is readable, responsive, and easy on the eyes.
  - Smooth, reliable playback: Start watching quickly and switch between available qualities. Subtitles and alternate audio tracks are supported when provided by your source.
  - Beautiful TV guide: See what’s on now and what’s coming next with an elegant program ribbon and quick peeks at details, times, and descriptions.
  - Built for big playlists: Handles large libraries with ease thanks to thoughtful loading and smart image caching—scrolling stays fast and fluid.
  - Favorites and history: Star your must‑watch channels, movies, and series, and quickly return to recently played items.
  - Bring your own artwork: Logos and posters from your provider are displayed and cached to keep browsing snappy.
  - Privacy first: No accounts, no tracking, no hidden services. Your sources and history stay on your device.
  - Thoughtful details: One‑tap refresh, category memory per tab, and a clean Settings area that makes adding, editing, and switching playlists simple.
  - Helpful support: A built‑in Support page lets you describe issues, include your playlist link (with the option to sanitize sensitive parts), and contact us directly.

  How it works

  - Add your own playlist link (commonly shared by legitimate providers) and, if available, an EPG guide link.
  - JamRun IPTV organizes your content into Live TV, Movies, and Series, preserving the provider’s original ordering and categories.
  - Use search and the category drawer to narrow results without losing the provider’s structure.

  Designed for iPhone

  - Optimized for iOS with a dark, cinematic look and intuitive gestures.

  Important

  - JamRun IPTV does not provide, host, or promote any playlist URLs, channels, or content. The app is a media player for user‑supplied playlists only.
  - You are solely responsible for the content you access and for complying with all applicable laws, terms, and licenses in your region.

  Whether your playlist spans a few channels or thousands of titles, JamRun IPTV turns it into a fast, elegant, and enjoyable experience—placing design, performance, and your control front and center.


Full privacy policy here, READ BEFORE INSTALLING AND USING. https://github.com/notsurewhoisthis/Diamond-IPTV/blob/main/PRIVACY.md

apps.name: Neutro IPTV Player
apps.description:
Disclaimer
Additional purchase is required in order to use the app. This app does not include any media content. Users must provide their own content, such as m3u playlists or XC/XUI portals that need to be purchased or collected from a different source that may cost you separately other than the app purchase. The app acts as a media player for legally provided content and does not distribute, host, or offer any TV channels, movies, or live streams.

General
Neutro IPTV Player is the best IPTV Player for MacOS where you can add your own M3U/M3U8 Playlists from Local device or web url, XC or XUI Portals with username and password to watch Live Tv, Movies and Series.

Neutro IPTV Player is the leading IPTV player OR M3U Player, providing top-notch features for IPTV streaming. Whether you’re looking for an IPTV player for your MacBook, Neutro has you covered with smooth playback and easy navigation. Watch Live Tv, Movies and Series from your M3U or XC/XUI API on MacBook.

How It works
- Disclaimer : We don’t provide any kind of streaming content and we have no any connection with any content provider. It is just a media player where you can add your own XC or XUI API based playlists or M3U/M3U8 playlists. You watch your own content. Use the app according to the laws of your country.

- Install the app.
- Add Your M3U/M3U8 Playlists from web or Local. Or Login with XC API with Portal Info, username and password from provider.

apps.name: PulseIPTV
apps.description:
PulseIPTV – A Modern Playlist-Based Media Player for iPhone

PulseIPTV turns your iPhone into a streamlined media playback environment, built to handle user-provided M3U playlists with high performance and an intuitive interface. Enjoy smooth playback of your personally supplied video streams, organized your way.

High-Performance Video Playback

PulseIPTV uses a dual-engine playback system for broad compatibility:
• AVPlayer integration for standard formats
• VLCKit integration for advanced formats, including MPEG-2
• Automatic detection of stream format and optimal player selection
• Intelligent buffering for consistent performance
• Full-screen support with proper aspect ratio handling

Unified Media Library

Keep all your playlist items organized in one place:
• Category-based organization of user-supplied streams
• Collections for movies and episodic content when provided by the playlist
• Automatic grouping and sorting for easier navigation
• Quick access to recently opened items

Smart Utility Features

Designed for efficient, personalized use:
• Favorites list for quick recall
• Custom groups for organizing playlist entries
• Support for multiple playlists
• EPG data display when the playlist includes compatible metadata
• Rapid navigation with next/previous controls
• Hardware button support for volume control
• Auto-hiding interface for uninterrupted viewing

Modern, Native Interface

Built with SwiftUI for a smooth, fluid iPhone experience:
• Clean, minimal layout optimized for touch
• Tab-based navigation for quick access to all sections
• Responsive playback controls
• Portrait and landscape orientation support

Privacy-Focused Architecture

Your information remains on your device:
• All data stored locally
• No accounts, tracking, analytics, or external servers
• Secure HTTPS/SSL handling for encrypted streams
• Your playlists never leave your device

Performance and Reliability

Optimized for everyday use:
• Native Swift/SwiftUI architecture
• Efficient memory and resource management
• Fast parsing of M3U playlists
• Cached data for faster loading
• Background operations that maintain UI responsiveness

Simple Setup

Add your M3U playlist URL or file

The app automatically organizes entries

Begin playback immediately

Supports the standard M3U format, including:
• Titles and thumbnails when included
• Group tags
• EPG metadata
• HTTP and HTTPS stream URLs

Free to Use

PulseIPTV has no subscriptions, in-app purchases, or feature restrictions.

Ideal For

• Users who already have valid M3U playlists
• Individuals seeking a native iOS media player
• Privacy-conscious users who prefer local-only data handling
• Anyone wanting an organized interface for personal streaming playlists

Ongoing Development

Regular updates deliver feature improvements, refinements, and performance enhancements.

Requirements
• iOS 17.0 or later
• User-provided M3U playlist
• Internet connection for accessing streams

Legal Notice

PulseIPTV is a general-purpose media player. It does not provide, host, aggregate, or recommend any content or playlists. Users are fully responsible for supplying their own playlists and ensuring they have the rights and authorization to access any content they stream.

apps.description:
The Professional IPTV Player for Apple Devices

Experience your M3U playlists like never before with SimpleIPTV, a native Apple app that combines powerful streaming technology with intuitive design. Built exclusively for iPhone, iPad, and Mac with the performance and polish you expect.

Stream Smarter, Not Harder
SimpleIPTV's intelligent playback engine automatically optimizes every stream for flawless viewing. From direct playback to advanced H.265/HEVC support, complex formats are handled seamlessly behind the scenes, you just press play.

Designed for Apple, Perfected for You
Every pixel and interaction is crafted specifically for your device. Enjoy true platform integration with Picture-in-Picture on iOS, floating player windows on macOS, and instant iCloud sync across all your Apple devices.

Why SimpleIPTV Stands Out:

Effortless Setup & Management
• Import M3U/M3U8 playlists instantly from URLs or files
• One-tap paste button for quick playlist additions
• Auto-update playlists to always have fresh content
• Smart organization by groups with instant search
• Mark favorites and track recently watched channels

Unmatched Compatibility
• Advanced codec support including H.265/HEVC
• Intelligent stream analysis with performance caching
• Automatic format conversion when needed
• Reliable playback across diverse stream types
• Optimized buffering for smooth viewing

Premium Features
• Picture-in-Picture: Continue watching while multitasking on iOS/iPadOS
• Floating Player: Always-on-top window for macOS

• Sorting Options: Organize channels your way (A-Z, recent, original order)

• iCloud Sync: Seamless experience across all devices

Built with Privacy in Mind
Your content is your business. SimpleIPTV stores everything locally on your device with zero tracking or analytics of your viewing habits. No accounts required, no data collected.

Perfect For:
• Cord-cutters managing multiple playlists
• International content viewers
• Sports and live event streaming
• Business and educational streams
• Anyone seeking a reliable, professional IPTV solution

Join thousands of users who've made SimpleIPTV their go-to streaming companion. Download now and discover the difference a truly native app makes.

apps.humanReview: I ran Smarters IPTV Pro: Player through a real playlist and it behaved like a tool, not a demo screen. apps.name: Snappier IPTV
apps.description:
Snappier IPTV is an application available on Apple TV (4K models preferred), iPad, and iPhone. It does not provide any content, so you must have your own provider. The free version of the app will stop playback after 240 seconds. The app features 3 powerful built-in media player’s.  KSPlayer, VLC and MPV.  KSPlayer that supports native Picture In Picture and HDR.  Snappier also has quick M3U and EPG parsing in the background and foreground, with support for 3rd party EPGs such as IPTVEditor through the External EPG URL option in settings.

Snappier supports multiple playlists and the ability to update all playlists or EPG at once. You can sync your data (except playlist data and epg data) across all your devices using Snappier IPTV via iCloud Support.

Snappier allows live TV, VOD Movie & TV Series streaming (depending on your provider) in SD, HD, and 4K along with TV Catchup (depending on your provider). You can also use internal subtitle support, select internal audio tracks, and auto save position when exiting playback of movie/tv series episode, with auto resume when restarting that item.  Video de-interlace options in the KSPlayer media player, with the option to change the video aspect ratio and buffer (KSPlayer and VLC media player), skip forward/backward (MPV on iOS doesn’t have this support yet), and adjust audio delay (KSPlayer and VLC media player).

Snappier IPTV also includes a multi-screen view (1x1, 2x1 and 2x2 format at the moment), an alternative list view for Live TV, EPG support (depending on your provider), and the ability to sort by date added, name, or original order for Live TV Channels, Movies, and TV Series.  You can also sort into any order you want as well as create custom categories to group your preferred items together.  Other features include favourites, parental controls, search channels, TV series, movies, EPG and actors' names, and play a one off network stream URL.

Snappier IPTV also includes metadata settings that allow you to customise the information displayed for your movies and TV series. With the metadata settings, you can change the plot information for movies and TV series to different languages.

Additionally, the app includes several other features, such as:

Xtream Codes  M3U or Xtream Codes Login option
Other M3U formats are limited
Tinyurl (and similar) support
Parental Control for Live TV categories and Movie Categories
Search All Playlists

There are many more features/options in Snappier.

Note that Snappier IPTV does not provide paid-for playlists, and not all paid-for providers support all features of the app. It is recommended to use an Xtream codes compatible provider for best results. You can use free to air M3U playlists, but some functions will be limited.

The app uses OpenSubtitles, The Movie Internet Database (TMDB), and JustWatch (via TMDB) as data sources, with KSPlayer, VLC and MPV as the video players. Apple TV HD will work but performance is not on par with the 4K versions so is not officially supported. For further information or support, please contact us via Discord.  Our server address is in the app under settings.

The app's terms of use can be found at https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/, and the privacy policy at http://www.snappy-code.co.uk/privacy

Full Description Structure

Play your own streams with a fast, secure player. Import M3U, M3U8, or provider credentials—no built‑in channels or catalogs. Legal, user‑supplied content only.

- Comprehensive Subtitle Support (New!)
Manage internal subtitles easily, select your preferred language track, and import external subtitle files (like .SRT) for video-on-demand content, ensuring you never miss a word.
- Audio Track Management (New!)
Effortlessly switch between available audio tracks within your stream to enjoy content in different languages or formats.

Log in using your provider’s Xtream Codes details and the app will automatically fetch and organize all your live and on‑demand content securely.
- M3U & M3U8 Playlist Support

Watch your channels in real time using full-screen mode, with title display and easy screen or volume adjustments for a comfortable viewing flow.
- Channel Browser & Favorites
Explore your playlists effortlessly, complete with channel names and logos. Keep your go‑to channels in one place for quick access.
Customizable Settings
Fine-tune every aspect of playback, display, and functionality. Upgrade to the PRO edition to unlock premium features and extended personalization.
Your Privacy, Fully Protected
EastPlayer respects your privacy completely — no tracking, no analytics, and no background data collection. All playlists are stored locally on your device for secure and private access.

Lifetime Access Available – Pay Once, Enjoy Forever, One Time Payment!
Other Product (Weekly,Monthly,Annual) subscription.

apps.name: UHF - Love your IPTV
apps.description:
Welcome to UHF, the IPTV player crafted by developers with over a decade of proven success in creating globally renowned apps used by millions.

Our users are our priority and so that we don't hide essential features behind a paywall. Enjoy all these playback and content management tools for FREE and make the most of your M3U8, Xtream and Stremio playlists:

Global search:
Swiftly search and access content, whether it's live TV channels, series or movies across all your playlists. Plus, with our intuitive icon and color semantics, effortlessly identify which playlists your items belong to.

A unique EPG:
While other apps replicate the traditional TV EPG without leveraging touchscreen capabilities, we've reinvented the EPG experience from the ground up, optimising for touch interaction.

Catch-up support:
Travel back in time and never miss a TV show. Our catchup support is smooth as you have never seen before.

Picture-in-Picture:
Watch your videos in a smaller, resizable window while simultaneously using other apps or even watching other videos inside UHF.

Trakt support:
Seamlessly track your watched shows and movies, rate episodes and films, and access your Trakt watchlist directly on the UHF home screen.

Advanced Playlist Customisation:
Mark items as favourites, rename, reorder categories, or shuffle items within playlists. You can also transfer items between categories.

DVR server:
Take full control of your IPTV recordings with UHF Server, a powerful companion app that lets you seamlessly schedule and record your favorite shows from the UHF app. Run it on any Linux, macOS, or Windows machine within your local network.

Multiple languages and subtitles:
Watch your videos and live streams as you should with our support for multiple audio tracks and subtitles (fetching subtitles from OpenSubtitles.com is now supported).

Smart reconnects:
Forget about reloading the video player when the connection drops. Our video player handles common playback errors for you.

Parental lock:
Guard specific categories with Touch ID or Face ID ensuring young ones steer clear of sensitive content.
We'll also ensure your locked items are excluded from both "favourites" and "recently watched" sections.

Offline support:
Download your VOD or catch-up content and watch it offline. With our background fetch feature, simply tap the download button and sent the app to background, we handle the rest.

Built-in VPN:
Protect your streaming activities from the prying eyes of ISPs and experience anonymous viewing while seamlessly controlling your IPTV content with our integrated VPN. Opt for flexibility by deactivating the "Always On" feature, which automatically turns off the VPN when you exit the app. Enjoy a hassle-free experience, eliminating the need to manually toggle your VPN with each app you use.

And for those willing and able to support our app development, we offer a PRO plan with these exclusive features:

* Instant Sync: Instantly synchronise your playlists, recent views, favourites, and customisations across devices. Make a change on one device, and it's immediately reflected on others. It's almost magical!
* Zero Ads and Watermarks: Enjoy content without any interruptions from banners or watermarks.
* Unlimited EPG Experience: Experience unlimited EPG navigation and set up alerts, so you never miss out on your favourite shows.

—

Important Notice: UHF is designed to work with content or playlists that users create themselves using legally sourced material. We at UHF do not allow the streaming of copyrighted content without the permission from the copyright holder. We respond swiftly if we receive any complaints about copyright violations and may suspend or delete your account. Only content added by users is shown and played on UHF, meaning that users are responsible for what is displayed. Please ensure you only use legal content on UHF.

Terms and Privacy Policy: https://www.uhfapp.com/legal

apps.name: Vision IPTV
apps.description:
Transform your IPTV experience with our comprehensive streaming application designed for modern entertainment enthusiasts. Our app delivers a premium viewing experience with intuitive navigation, advanced features, and seamless content management across all your devices.

Connect and manage multiple IPTV providers effortlessly with our multi-account management system. Switch between different services with a single tap, making it perfect for households with various subscriptions or users exploring different content libraries. The streamlined interface ensures you can access all your entertainment sources without complexity.

Browse movies, TV series, and live channels through our intuitive categorization system. Advanced search functionality helps you find content instantly, while the clean layout makes discovering new favorites simple and enjoyable. Each piece of content includes detailed information such as cast, directors, ratings, and comprehensive plot summaries to help you make informed viewing choices.

Enjoy crystal-clear playback with our optimized video engine that automatically adjusts quality based on your connection. The enhanced player supports subtitles, multiple audio tracks, and playback speed control for a customized viewing experience. Our smart progress tracking remembers exactly where you stopped watching across all devices, ensuring seamless continuation of your entertainment.

For premium users, download your favorite movies and episodes for offline viewing. This feature is perfect for travel, commutes, or areas with limited connectivity, allowing you to enjoy entertainment anywhere and anytime without internet access.

The modern interface features a sleek, user-friendly design that makes navigation effortless. Dark mode support and intuitive gestures create a viewing experience tailored to your preferences, while the responsive layout works beautifully on phones and tablets alike.

Built with cutting-edge technology for reliability and performance, the app includes automatic updates to ensure you always have the latest features and security improvements. Your data stays private with local storage and secure connections, with no unnecessary permissions or data collection.

Premium benefits include unlimited downloads and multi-account support through a one-time purchase that provides lifetime access with no recurring fees. Whether you're discovering new movies, following series, or staying updated with live channels, our app provides the tools needed for an exceptional IPTV experience.

Perfect for IPTV enthusiasts seeking a premium experience, families managing multiple entertainment sources, travelers wanting offline content access, and users who value organization and ease of use.

However, you must not use Zen Player to play sources to which you do not have the rights, under penalty of prosecution by the rights holders. Zen Player does not endorse illegal IPTV subscriptions.

EULA : https://zeniptv.app/cgu.html

apps.humanReview: I used Zen IPTV Player for IPTV during a long session, and it stayed steady enough that I stopped watching the buffer. It keeps the focus on the stream, not the chrome around it. Adding a playlist was the boring part, which is exactly how it should be. EPG loading is acceptable, and it does not stall the whole UI. It feels like the devs actually use the app, and that shows in small ways. The current build is v1.9.1, updated on 2025-11-28, which reads as active maintenance. Compatibility is solid on iOS and macOS 13.0+; that baseline is realistic in 2025. The latest notes include "New features: - Ability to reorder favorite channels. - Channels displayed as a list on mo", a small signal that the devs are still watching. Ratings are 4.75789 across 95 reviews; that is consistent with what I saw. At Free, it sits in a sensible spot for a focused IPTV player. (I did a double-take on the EPG, then it loaded.) I expected lag, then it stayed smooth - go figure. If I am choosing the best overall, JamRun IPTV still takes the crown for iOS and macOS.
